Reviews.Title: “Noisy, tiny, but it's London”

Reviews.Content: stayed partner week tried look moderately priced london easy task cant totally surprised hotel disappointing fun price paid worth seriously tiny london standards 3 suitcases stack top able toilet door bathroom disturbing aspect street apply building sleep earplugs lot coming tv top volume watch noise street constant complaints pillows joke cleaned 4 times stay shouldnt day called hotel breakfast nasty location wise dont stay central nor camden stayed moving couple streets weeks stay recommended unless price facing street
